verses.verse: They took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H362>Elim,<s%> and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> which is between <S%H362>Elim<s%> and <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> after their departing <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
The whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%>

and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4310>them,<s%> "We wish that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when we <S%H3427>sat<s%> by the <S%H1320>meat<s%> <S%H5518>pots,<s%> when we <S%H398>ate<s%> our <S%H7648>fill<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> for you have brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> into this <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> this whole <S%H6951>assembly<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger.<s%>"

Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4305>"Behold,<s%> I will rain <S%H3899>bread<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky<s%> for <S%H5971>you,<s%> and the people shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H3950>gather<s%> a <S%H1697>day<s%>'s portion every <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I may <S%H5254>test<s%> <S%H3212>them,<s%> whether they will walk in my <S%H8451>law,<s%> or not.

It shall come to pass on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that they shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> they bring <S%H935>in,<s%> and it shall be <S%H4932>twice<s%> as much as they <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H3117>daily.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "At <S%H6153>evening,<s%> then you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

and in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> then you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> because he <S%H8085>hears<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Who are <S%H5168>we,<s%> that you murmur against <S%H3885>us?<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Now <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1320>meat<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> <S%H3068>you;<s%> because Yahweh <S%H8085>hears<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> which you <S%H3885>murmur<s%> against <S%H5168>him.<s%> And who are we? Your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> are not against <S%H3068>us,<s%> but against Yahweh."

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>"Tell<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7126><s%> 'Come near <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings.<s%>'"

It <S%H175>happened,<s%> as Aaron <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H6437>looked<s%> toward the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H3519>behold,<s%> the glory of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H996><s%> 'At evening you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat,<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>'"

It happened at <S%H6153>evening<s%> that <S%H7958>quail<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H7902>lay<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

When the <S%H2919>dew<s%> that <S%H7902>lay<s%> had <S%H5927>gone,<s%> <S%H6440>behold,<s%> on the surface of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> was a <S%H1851>small<s%> round <S%H2636>thing,<s%> <S%H1851>small<s%> as the <S%H3713>frost<s%> on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

When the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H559>it,<s%> they said <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> "What is <S%H4478>it?<s%>" For they <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know what it <S%H4872>was.<s%> Moses <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3899>them,<s%> "It is the bread which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you to <S%H402>eat.<s%>"

This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> <S%H3950>"Gather<s%> of it <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating;<s%> an <S%H6016>omer<s%> a <S%H1538>head,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H5315>persons,<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H376>it,<s%> every man for those who are in his <S%H168>tent.<s%>"
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3950>so,<s%> and gathered some <S%H7235>more,<s%> some <S%H4591>less.<s%>

When they <S%H4058>measured<s%> it with an <S%H6016>omer,<s%> he who gathered <S%H7235>much<s%> had nothing <S%H5736>over,<s%> and he who gathered <S%H4591>little<s%> had no <S%H2637>lack.<s%> They <S%H3950>gathered<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>them,<s%> "Let no one <S%H3498>leave<s%> of it until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>"

Notwithstanding they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> but <S%H582>some<s%> of them <S%H3498>left<s%> of it until the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and it <S%H7311>bred<s%> <S%H8438>worms,<s%> and became <S%H887>foul:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was angry with <S%H7107>them.<s%>

They <S%H3950>gathered<s%> it morning by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating.<s%> When the <S%H8121>sun<s%> grew <S%H2552>hot,<s%> it <S%H4549>melted.<s%>

It happened that on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H4932>twice<s%> as much <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6016>omers<s%> for each <S%H259>one,<s%> and all the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>them,<s%> "This is that which Yahweh has <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H4279><s%> 'Tomorrow is a solemn <S%H7677>rest,<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H644>Bake<s%> that which you want to <S%H644>bake,<s%> and <S%H1310>boil<s%> that which you want to <S%H1310>boil;<s%> and all <S%H3605>that<s%> remains <S%H5736>over<s%> lay <S%H3240>up<s%> for yourselves to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>'"
They laid it <S%H3240>up<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>asked,<s%> and it <S%H887>didn't<s%> become foul, neither was there any worm in <S%H7415>it.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H398>"Eat<s%> that <S%H3117>today,<s%> for <S%H3117>today<s%> is a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3117>Today<s%> you shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> it in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H7637>it,<s%> but on the seventh <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>Sabbath.<s%> In it there shall be none."
It happened on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that some of the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3950>gather,<s%> and they found <S%H4672>none.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "How long do you <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H8451>laws?<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> therefore he <S%H5414>gives<s%> you on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of two <S%H3117>days.<s%> <S%H376>Everyone<s%> <S%H3427>stay<s%> in his <S%H376>place.<s%> Let no one go <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>"
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> its <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4478>Manna,<s%> and it was like <S%H1407>coriander<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> and its <S%H2940>taste<s%> was like <S%H6838>wafers<s%> with <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H4393><s%> 'Let an <S%H6016>omer-full<s%> of it be <S%H4931>kept<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> that they may <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> with which I <S%H398>fed<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> when I brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H6803>pot,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> an <S%H6016>omer-full<s%> <S%H4393>of<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> in <S%H3240>it,<s%> and lay it up <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>"
As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so <S%H175>Aaron<s%> laid it <S%H3240>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>Testimony,<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> until they <S%H935>came<s%> to an <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%> They <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%> until they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H7097>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
Now an <S%H6016>omer<s%> is the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>
